content.p: Associate Professor, Betsy has been teaching Mathematics since 1998. She graduated from University of Malaya with a Bachelor degree with honors in Mathematics in the year of 1990. She was offered a fellowship from University of Malaya to involve in a tidal modeling research project and she was awarded a Master degree in 1994. She also obtained a Master degree in Information Technology in the year of 2004. She joined the School of Mathematical Sciences, University of Nottingham Malaysia since January, 2011. Pre-calculus, Calculus, Foundation Algebra, Applied Algebra, Mathematics for Engineers, Engineering Mathematics Her research is related to mathematics education and digital technology in teaching at the tertiary level.
